thread.title: Thank you to our line and tree workers!
thread.title_full: Thank you to our line and tree workers!

author: Tensegrity (invalid@example.com)
title: Thank you to our line and tree workers!
text:
[Tensegrity](/members/tensegrity.521201/)
Platinum Member
- Joined
- Jul 13, 2019
- Messages
- 857
We're getting hammered by second storm this week with >90mph gusts. The area is pretty messy but not catastrophic yet. Our property has been secured well over the years, and my fam and animals are safe, dry and warm.
I have to present my sincerest THANK YOU to all of the brother and sister line and tree workers doing what you do to keep families safe and the country's infrastructure intact.
Looking at you
and any others in this community.
Last night, like Tues, I've been up for >24hrs checking on the house, obsessively checking fire extinguishers and electric loads.... and throughout both times, these folks keep slinking by in their trucks, assessing and repairing, regardless of weather or hour.
Thank you for what you do Michael, and others!!!
I have to present my sincerest THANK YOU to all of the brother and sister line and tree workers doing what you do to keep families safe and the country's infrastructure intact.
Looking at you
[](/members/emcee.497347/) [EMCEE](/members/emcee.497347/)
and any others in this community.
Last night, like Tues, I've been up for >24hrs checking on the house, obsessively checking fire extinguishers and electric loads.... and throughout both times, these folks keep slinking by in their trucks, assessing and repairing, regardless of weather or hour.
Thank you for what you do Michael, and others!!!
